text: Lɨhavɨdaci 14.6 Mt 10.23 Polɨ hula Banabasɨ hula ciaŋ hɨjɨ agadɨ igahɨlavɨla Aikoniam haiabɨla valavɨla Likonia fɨli tɨbɨ uavɨmi. Uavɨla haiabɨla mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ hɨdavɨmi. Lisɨtɨla haiabɨla Delɨbe haiabɨla uavɨmi. Haiabɨla sudɨme cɨki cɨki Lisɨtɨla haiabɨla Delɨbe haiabɨla mikɨ mikɨ hɨniavɨhadami heŋ avi uavɨmi.
